text: Aleksei Sergeyevich Sukharev (; born 11 January 2003) is a Russian football player. He plays for FC Avangard Kursk. ==Club career== Sukharev made his debut in the Russian Football National League for FC Avangard Kursk on 24 July 2019 in a game against FC Tom Tomsk. On 16 June 2020, CSKA Moscow confirmed that Sukharev's loan deal with the club had ended and he'd left CSKA. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile by Russian Football National League * * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Avangard Kursk players Category:PFC CSKA Moscow players
title: Aleksei Sukharev
